div.pre: 1755 Medain Salih (El Hedjer) ?, c. 300 km. (360, 892) NW of Medina, Arabia, before 1856 Burial: 4th cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 25 AR "Egypto-Arabian": fr. (Traité II.2, nos. 1044-8, 1072-6) Disposition: Osnabrück Schledehaus, in Grote, Münzstud. 2 (1862), pp. 484-9, illus. Erman, ZfN 1882, pp. 296-301, illus. Erman is undoubtedly right in regarding the two lots (Noe 360, 892) as part of the same hd. found in Arabia. He suggests that a section was brought to lower Egypt by a pilgrim returning from Mecca
